argumentText:
ARGUMENT
u

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscbn.x | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | iscbn.8 | |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( u = U -> ( IndMet ` u ) = ( IndMet ` U ) ) |
| 4 | 3, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( u = U -> ( IndMet ` u ) = D ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( u = U -> ( BaseSet ` u ) = ( BaseSet ` U ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( u = U -> ( BaseSet ` u ) = X ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( u = U -> ( CMet ` ( BaseSet ` u ) ) = ( CMet ` X ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( u = U -> ( ( IndMet ` u ) e. ( CMet ` ( BaseSet ` u ) ) <-> D e. ( CMet ` X ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_df-cbn | |- CBan = { u e. NrmCVec | ( IndMet ` u ) e. ( CMet ` ( BaseSet ` u ) ) } |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( U e. CBan <-> ( U e. NrmCVec /\ D e. ( CMet ` X ) ) ) |
